description: This file defines a data access layer (DAL) class for interacting with a Neo4j graph database, specifically handling roles, competencies, relationships like REQUIRES and ADJACENT_TO, and related database operations.

classes.name: GraphDAL
classes.description: A data access layer class encapsulating methods to create, update, and retrieve graph data involving roles, competencies, and their relationships in a Neo4j database.

methods.name: None upsert_role( self, role_id: str, name: Optional[str] = None, description: Optional[str] = None, metadata: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, source: Optional[str] = None, version: Optional[str] = None, )
methods.description: Creates or updates a Role node in the database identified by its id, setting various optional properties.

methods.name: None upsert_competency( self, competency_id: str, name: Optional[str] = None, definition: Optional[str] = None, metadata: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, source: Optional[str] = None, version: Optional[str] = None, )
methods.description: Creates or updates a Competency node in the database identified by its id, setting properties such as name and definition.

methods.name: None upsert_requires_edge( self, role_id: str, competency_id: str, required_level: Optional[str] = None, version: Optional[str] = None, source: Optional[str] = None, valid_from: Optional[str] = None, valid_to: Optional[str] = None, )
methods.description: Creates or updates a REQUIRES relationship from a Role to a Competency, with optional properties like required level and validity period.

methods.name: None upsert_adjacency( self, role_a: str, role_b: str, score: Optional[float] = None, rationale: Optional[str] = None, version: Optional[str] = None, source: Optional[str] = None, bidirectional: bool = True, )
methods.description: Creates or updates an ADJACENT_TO relationship between two roles, optionally in both directions.

methods.name: List[Dict[str,Any]] get_role_adjacency( self, user_id: Optional[str] = None, current_role_id: Optional[str] = None, target_role_id: Optional[str] = None, limit: int = 20, )
methods.description: Retrieves adjacent or suggested roles for a given role, optionally considering a target role for path-based scoring.

ctags.name: get_role_adjacency
ctags.signature: ( self, user_id: Optional[str] = None, current_role_id: Optional[str] = None, target_role_id: Optional[str] = None, limit: int = 20, )

ctags.name: upsert_adjacency
ctags.signature: ( self, role_a: str, role_b: str, score: Optional[float] = None, rationale: Optional[str] = None, version: Optional[str] = None, source: Optional[str] = None, bidirectional: bool = True, )

ctags.name: upsert_competency
ctags.signature: ( self, competency_id: str, name: Optional[str] = None, definition: Optional[str] = None, metadata: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, source: Optional[str] = None, version: Optional[str] = None, )

ctags.name: upsert_requires_edge
ctags.signature: ( self, role_id: str, competency_id: str, required_level: Optional[str] = None, version: Optional[str] = None, source: Optional[str] = None, valid_from: Optional[str] = None, valid_to: Optional[str] = None, )

ctags.name: upsert_role
ctags.signature: ( self, role_id: str, name: Optional[str] = None, description: Optional[str] = None, metadata: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, source: Optional[str] = None, version: Optional[str] = None, )
